channel.title: Range Help
channel.description:
I'm trying to code my karils x-bow and it won't use as a bow! instead it just disapeers and i attack with my fist. How would I code a weapon to use arrows?
Also how do you make weapons attack from a distance e.g javalins and throwing axes?
Any help would be a apprieciated. :)
